text: Shkodra Elektronike is an Albanian-Italian folktronica duo and consists of members Kolë Laca and Beatriçe Gjergji. The duo both hold Albanian and Italian citizenships. They represented Albania at the Eurovision Song Contest 2025 with the song "Zjerm", they finished 9th in the final with 218 points. ==Discography== ===Extended plays=== Title Details Live @ Uzina * Released: 10 March 2022 * Label: Alt Orient * Formats: Digital download, streaming Shndrit! * Released: 23 May 2025 * Label: NUDA * Formats: Digital download, streaming ===Singles=== Title Year Peak chart positions Album LTU SWE Heat.
